title: User Account Creation
description: As a customer, I want to create a user account, so that I can access personalized features and manage my profile.
attributes_and_rules: User should be able to sign up using email and mobile number
Password encryption must be implemented
Support for social login options (Google, Facebook)

acceptance_criteria.criteria: User can create an account using email

steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters valid email and password
Then the account is created successfully

test_cases.test_case: Failed account creation with invalid email
steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters invalid email
Then an error message is displayed

acceptance_criteria.criteria: User can create an account using mobile number

steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters valid mobile number and password
Then the account is created successfully

test_cases.test_case: Failed account creation with invalid mobile number
steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters invalid mobile number
Then an error message is displayed

acceptance_criteria.criteria: User can log in using social media accounts

steps: Given the user is on the login page
When the user selects Google login
Then the user is logged in successfully
Given the user is on the login page
When the user selects Google login with invalid credentials
Then an error message is displayed

title: Product Catalog Creation
description: As an administrator, I want to create and manage a product catalog, so that customers can browse and find products efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Support categorization and tagging
Implement advanced search options
Enable filtering by price, brand, ratings, and availability
Ensure scalability for large inventories

steps: Given the admin is on the product management page
When the admin assigns categories to products
Then the products are categorized successfully
Given the user is on the search page
When the user enters search criteria
Then the matching products are displayed
Given the user is on the product catalog page
When the user applies a price filter
Then products within the selected price range are displayed

title: Product Details Display
description: As a customer, I want to view detailed product information and reviews, so that I can make informed purchase decisions.
attributes_and_rules: Display high-quality images and specifications
Include pricing and stock status
Enable user reviews and aggregated ratings

steps: Given the user is on the product detail page
When the page loads
Then high-quality images, specifications, pricing, and stock status are displayed
Given the user is on the product detail page
When the user submits a review
Then the review is added successfully

title: Shopping Cart Management
description: As a customer, I want to add, update, or remove items in the shopping cart, so that I can manage my selected items before checkout.
attributes_and_rules: Enable adding products to the cart
Allow updating item quantities
Support removal of items from the cart
Ensure cart persistence across sessions and devices

steps: Given the user is on the product detail page
When the user adds a product to the cart
Then the product is added successfully
Given the user is on the shopping cart page
When the user updates the quantity of a product
Then the product quantity is updated successfully
Given the user is on the shopping cart page
When the user removes an item from the cart
Then the item is removed successfully

title: Secure Checkout Process
description: As a customer, I want to complete a secure checkout, so that I can confidently make purchases online.
attributes_and_rules: Include address management
Provide delivery options
Support integrated payment gateways
Ensure compliance with PCI DSS standards

steps: Given the user is on the checkout page
When the user adds a new address
Then the address is saved successfully
Given the user is on the payment page
When the user enters valid credit card details
Then the payment is processed successfully

title: Order Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my orders in real-time, so that I can stay informed about the status of my purchases.
attributes_and_rules: Provide order confirmations
Include shipment details and delivery updates
Support order cancellation, returns, and refunds
Integrate notifications

steps: Given the user has completed a purchase
When the order is confirmed
Then the user receives a confirmation notification
Given the user is on the order tracking page
When the user views shipment details
Then the current status is displayed

title: Inventory Management
description: As an administrator, I want to handle inventory synchronization and vendor coordination, so that stock levels are always accurate.
attributes_and_rules: Manage stock levels
Maintain supplier details and procurement processes
Ensure real-time updates for product availability
Enable integration with vendor systems

steps: Given the stock level has changed
When the system updates inventory
Then the new stock level is reflected immediately
Given the admin is adding a new vendor
When the vendor details are saved
Then the vendor is integrated into the system

title: Customer Service
description: As a customer, I want to access support services and provide feedback, so that my issues are resolved and my opinions are heard.
attributes_and_rules: Include live chat and ticketing systems
Allow feedback collection
Enable query tracking and resolution status
Incorporate automated FAQs and chatbot support

steps: Given the user is on the support page
When the user initiates a live chat
Then the chat session starts successfully
Given the user is on the feedback page
When the user submits feedback
Then the feedback is recorded successfully

title: Campaign Management
description: As an administrator, I want to manage marketing campaigns and promotions, so that customer engagement and retention are improved.
attributes_and_rules: Create and monitor discount codes
Support seasonal sales and loyalty programs
Enable personalized offers based on purchase history

steps: Given the admin is on the campaign management page
When the admin creates a discount code
Then the discount code is available for use
Given the customer has a purchase history
When the system generates offers
Then the customer receives personalized offers

title: Analytics Dashboard
description: As an administrator, I want to access business insights and performance reports, so that I can make better decisions.
attributes_and_rules: Track sales performance and customer behavior
Monitor product trends
Include customizable reporting tools
Analyze KPIs such as revenue and conversion rates

steps: Given the admin is on the analytics dashboard
When the admin views sales data
Then the sales performance is displayed accurately
Given the admin is on the reporting page
When the admin customizes a report
Then the customized report is generated successfully
